amendment.description: Amendment reduces funding for salaries and expenses at SBA by $3,882,000 and increases funding for entrepeneurial development programs by a similar amount.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce salaries and expenses at SBA by $3,882,000 and to increase funding for entrepeneurial development programs by a similar amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A017) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A017) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A017) offered by Mr. Gosar.
